creator: QUp World Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Driver Pegasus is designed to cleverly professionalize the daily activities of a driver, get them more booking requests and contributively leveraging the fleets’ efficiency and revenues.
Driver Pegasus provides drivers with all they need to well - serve their passengers.
Let’s check out the outstanding features of Driver Pegasus:

FAIR JOB ASSIGNMENT SYSTEMS
• Acquire more jobs due to fair auto-dispatching system
• Get rid of dead miles and jostling – for – passenger issues
HIGH INTERACTION WITH PASSENGERS
• Accurately navigate to passengers’ locations and destinations
• Automatically update passengers’ information and the car’s itinerary
• Keep constant contact with passengers via phone calls and messages
MULTIPLE PAYMENT METHODS WITH AMAZING SUPPORTING FUNCTIONS
• Flexibly have the rides paid by multiple payment methods
• Make payment quickly and automatically to reduce payment - related tasks.
LEVERAGE YOUR PERFORMANCE WITH AUTO-ARCHIVING SYSTEM
• Manage multiple auto-archived receipts logically
• Analyze everyday turnovers with insightful reports
• Protect the whole system by pass code

Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
To get more information about Driver Pegasus, please visit: http://www.QUpworld.com
descriptionShort: An app designed to cleverly professionalize daily activities of drivers!

descriptionShort: An app designed to cleverly professionalize daily activities of drivers!
title: Driver Pegasus

creator: QUp World Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Our all-in-one technology platform has all the tools and features you need to operate/grow in your city!

QUp has the fleet management and dispatch software to manage all your transport and delivery bookings. We work with you to build and design tools to fit your local market needs.

QUp Driver app is for fleet partners to test out the QUp system. The app allows ride-hailing, ride share, limo, chauffeur, taxi, black car, airport transfer, shuttle service, and delivery businesses to manage rides, provide tracking, and receive new jobs through the dispatch software. We support both on-demand and advanced booking.

Managing Rides:

- View trip assignments, trip details, booking history and upcoming reservations
- VoIP free calling between drivers and customers. (Useful for overseas customers)
- In-app chat messaging. Translation available for customers and drivers to chat in their native language.
- Display greeting signs and e-signatures on customer arrival.
- Proof of delivery and option for signature.
- GPS navigation to customer.

Tracking

- Track driver’s GPS route
- Mark a driver as on-duty or off duty
- In-app flight updates to schedule trips accordingly
- Real-time updates for any booking changes
- Report on driver logs, hours online, actions taken, availability, etc

Dispatch

- Optimize trip route
- Different modes of dispatching to optimize fleet revenue
- Emergency contact in case of an accident

Payment

- Driver Wallet top-up
- Support to integrate your local payment gateway
- Driver and customer referral incentive
- Driver quests to complete jobs and earn bonus

And so much more!

**Contact us**

Why limo anywhere when you can start your transport or delivery business here. Contact us to learn more about how our solution can help grow your fleet!

https://www.qupworld.com
https://www.facebook.com/qupworld
https://www.linkedin.com/company/qupworld
https://www.instagram.com/qupworld

- View trip assignments, trip details, booking history and upcoming reservations
- VoIP free calling between drivers and customers. (Useful for overseas customers)
- In-app chat messaging. Translation available for customers and drivers to chat in their native language.
- Display greeting signs and e-signatures on customer arrival.
- Proof of delivery and option for signature.
- GPS navigation to customer.

Tracking

- Track driver’s GPS route
- Mark a driver as on-duty or off duty
- In-app flight updates to schedule trips accordingly
- Real-time updates for any booking changes
- Report on driver logs, hours online, actions taken, availability, etc

Dispatch

- Optimize trip route
- Different modes of dispatching to optimize fleet revenue
- Emergency contact in case of an accident

Payment

- Driver Wallet top-up
- Support to integrate your local payment gateway
- Driver and customer referral incentive
- Driver quests to complete jobs and earn bonus

And so much more!

**Contact us**

Why limo anywhere when you can start your transport or delivery business here. Contact us to learn more about how our solution can help grow your fleet!

https://www.qupworld.com
https://www.facebook.com/qupworld
https://www.linkedin.com/company/qupworld
https://www.instagram.com/qupworld
